content.body: I'd be happy to run the meeting on the 18th while Shu is absent. We can chat about capabilities and the module registry then, working it out together as a group. I really like Mark's thoughts around that. I think Nicolo also has some thoughts.
We probably also should close the loop on the Matrix discussion above about coloring of unsafe functions, and how Atomics/Reflect APIs should work with shared object in unsafe contexts
